Crafted from a high-quality blend of polyester, viscose, and spandex, this jacket combines durability, comfort, and subtle stretch for ease of movement. Double vents at the back provide added flexibility and breathability, making it ideal for both professional settings and sophisticated casual wear. Its expert construction and fabric choice deliver a polished appearance while maintaining all-day comfort.
